__TOC__

<nowiki>[[File:UAS-small.png]]</nowiki>

=== What's this about ===

As the final part of the <nowiki>[[http://developer.ubuntu.com/showdown/|Ubuntu App Showdown]]</nowiki>, we're organizing a second round of voting where any community member can rate and vouch for their favourite apps in the contest.

This also means that app authors have yet another chance of getting prizes: the 3 winners with highest-rated apps will take a Nokia N9 smartphone home each! 

=== How to vote ===

It's quite simple:

* You've got 2 weeks to cast your vote, until Wed 29th of August 2012
* App authors are allowed to do any changes to their app during the voting period
* Install the apps you want to review and rate. <nowiki>[[#Applications|Take me to the list of apps >]]</nowiki>
* Go to the judging sheet and follow the instructions. <nowiki>[[http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/P56YNQ9|Take me to the judging sheet >]]</nowiki>
* You can go back to the judging sheet any time and change and complete your ratings up until the time voting closes

=== Promote your app ===

As an app author, we'd recommend you to promote your app so that it gets more visibility and more votes. Here are some tips:

* Blog about your app and the cool things that it does
* Create a screencast to show off your app
* Write a high-quality article about your app and submit it to a news site
* Share the news about your app on your social accounts
* Let voters know about your app on the Ubuntu social channels:
** <nowiki>[[http://www.reddit.com/r/UbuntuAppShowdown|AppShowdown reddit]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://gplus.to/ubuntuappdev|Ubuntu App Developers G+ page]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://www.facebook.com/ubuntuappdev|Ubuntu App Developers Facebook page]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[https://twitter.com/ubuntuappdev|Ubuntu App Developers Twitter account]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://planet.ubuntu.com|Planet Ubuntu]]</nowiki>
* Be responsive to feedback and be prompt in fixing any bugs
* Complete the information about your app on the table below:
** Add a thumbnail (note: use a max width of 128px)
** Add a description
* Be creative! Think of other ways and other places to promote your app

You might also want to address the <nowiki>[[..-JudgesFeedback|feedback judges left for your app]]</nowiki> during the jury vote.

=== Applications ===

These are the apps that are up for the Community Vote.

You can easily install them from each author's Personal Packaging Archive (PPA) by:

# Opening a terminal
# Copying and pasting the relevant command line on the '''INSTALLATION''' column for the app you want to install and pressing Enter.

Once installed and tested, you're <nowiki>[[http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/P56YNQ9|ready to start voting!]]</nowiki>
